actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act that established the Keweenaw National Historical Park to require the Secretary of the Interior to consider nominees of various local interests in appointing members of the Keweenaw National Historic Park Advisory Commission.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior, in appointing members to the Keweenaw National Historical Park Advisory Commission, only to consider (not necessarily, as currently, to make appointments from) the nominees submitted by the Governor of Michigan and various local councils.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act that established the Keweenaw National Historical Park to require the Secretary of the Interior to consider nominees of various local interests in appointing members of the Keweenaw National Historic Park Advisory Commission.
